source_reference.text: Marriage Advice for Couples and Newlyweds - Bill Johnson | Q&A (Video by BillJohnsonTeaching)

content_summary:
Subscribe for weekly videos:
https://bit.ly/BJMYouTube

Bill Johnson and Dan Farrelly discuss humility, fighting on the same team, how to keep loving God passionately, and put Him first in your marriage.
